meta.hint:
A prefix can be added to the beginning of a word. It changes the meaning of the word. Base words are words that can be combined with prefixes and suffixes. They can also be used on their own.
Look at the word unhelpful.
The base word is help. The prefix is un-. It goes before the base word.
The suffix is -ful. It goes after the base word.
